text: Fabio Crotta (born 4 September 1979) is a Swiss equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:People from Locarno
title: Fabio Crotta
